interactWithOthers: Interact with others on Pharmacy discovery
reminderToCheck: Remember to check medicine expiry dates
emergencyCallDescription: Call our dedicated line for immediate assistance when every second counts.
registerPharmacyDescription: Partner with us to expand your reach and help the community access your services.
joinCommunityDescription: Be part of a growing network that connects individuals to essential healthcare services.

ctaText: Ready to get started? Join our community and make finding medication stress-free!

header.title: Make Sure!
header.content: Verify before you go! Suggest a reliable link between students and health resources.
